description:
I love this Perfect TWO BEDROOM suite is located near Two Bridges, South Street Seaport, City Hall Park, Subways F,4,5,6,Z,M, Chatham Park & 5 Points downtown. You’ll love my place; Two large bedrooms with natural light, comfy beds, really quiet at night for the ultimate sleep. located so close to transport and in the heart of the downtown Manhattans Two Bridges area walking distance to hundreds of attractions.  My place is good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids), and groups.

Two large Bedrooms with clean sheets, towels and everything you'll need for a perfect visit.   The kitchen has everything plates, silverware, pots and pans you'll need, and all appliances you'll need.

I'm always available to share advice on visiting places, assistance on transportation, also please let me know if you need anything at all

The neighborhood has so much to offer, really a lot of hustle and bussle you come to expect with NYC.  When you step out the apartment and look up you'll see the most modern sky scrapers/ buildings in the world.    Hundreds of restaurants all within walking distance, you can walk to SOHO, LES, Brooklyn, South Street Seaport, Wall Street Canal street all within minutes.  New York is the best city in the world and you will experience all the sights with in walking distance from this beautiful two bedroom.

Subways 4,5,6, J, Z and Bus routes on Madison and Bowery.
name: Awesome Two BDRM CHTWN Manhattan!
review: Great location! Not too busy but enough to be exciting.
